text:
RadBots (https://radbots.com/) | Applied AI/ML Hackers, Engineers, Futurists, Cybernetics, Crypto, Systems Engineers, Hardware/Electrical Engineers, Bot Developers, Optics | San Francisco | Co-founders, ONSITE / REMOTE

We're an early stage startup looking to build cool stuff. We're on a mission to build companion intelligence through working models of natural systems.

Some of the things we've built and are working on: Multi-agent operating systems with federated learning and inference pipelines, Multi-agent transactions (temporal-based stateful sessions), Agent-to-agent (bot-to-bot) communications, Deep learning + Models as a service.

We're looking for people who want to build stuff that enables us to ask more questions and maybe even answer a few. Our big vision is to help figure out why we're all here and what it all means.

Baqqer: https://baqqer.com/users/dan-gailey Twitter: https://twitter.com/dpg Email: dan@radbots.com
